title: [1.10.2][What's That Slot?——那格有什么？]查看这格可以放什么..
author: 俺素苦力怕
txt_content:
本帖最后由 俺素苦力怕 于 2016-8-16 11:13 编辑 

What's That Slot?那格放什么


这是什么?
只需按一个键即可让 What's That Slot (WTS) 能查看这格可以放什么物品。




该怎么用?
食用 What's That Slot (WTS) 非常简单 ， 你只需要鼠标对准一个格子按“ P ”键。然后.....左边就会出现一个框框，出现可以放入的东西的列表辣！



举个栗子!

WTS的作者的截图：

作者原文
What?
What's That Slot (WTS) allows you to check what items can be put into hovered slot with a single press of a key!

How?
Using WTS is very simple, all you need to do is press 'P' (configurable) on your keyboard while hovering over a slot and the mod will show you what you can put inside!

Here are some examples......
